title: Stage a Productivity Revolution with Process Automation, AI and Data Fabric
author: Adam Glaser
description: Analyzing and automating processes, infusing them with AI, and adopting a more intelligent approach to data management are the keys to achieving this objective.
cntitle: 利用流程自动化、人工智能和数据结构实现生产力革命
cndescription: 分析和自动化流程，为其注入人工智能，并采用更智能的数据管理方法是实现这一目标的关键。
